title: Language Learning Projects Through Collaborative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of fundamental work-related terminology
context.additional_context: Establishment of a real-time collaborative and feedback environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can solve language tasks collaboratively through real-workflow scenario-based projects
Learners can improve language use strategies through peer assessment and self-reflection
Learners can participate in the instructional design process to develop content that reflects their learning needs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
